entry.title: Here is an example post.
entry.body:
μProse makes blogging easy. No databases & minimal setup. You just upload the files, create a config file with the configuration generator and write posts.

Your prose or code without any of the hassle.

entry.title: Here is an older post.
entry.body: Did we mention you all your posts are ordered chronologically and can be sorted by category. μProse has the basics you expect in a blogging platform.
